bot: Hello there!  I'm your guide to India's amazing museums.  Ask me about any museum in India – I'll do my best to help! ✨

messages.bot: Hello!  I'm your guide to Indian museums.  Ask me about any museum in India – I'm ready to help!
Hello there!  How can I help you plan your museum adventure in India?  Tell me what you're looking for!

Please tell me what you'd like to know!  I need more information to help you.  Are you asking about a specific museum in India? A particular artifact?  A type of museum?  The history of museums in India?  Give me some details so I can assist you. 😊
